column4: Can anyone help me with pc to pc networking between an xp box and Ubuntu? They are connected via cross cable.
setup static ip's or a dhcp server. seeif they can ping each other by ip.. if so . they are networked.
gigabit nic's are supposed to auto-negoiate and not need a 'crossover' cable. non-gb cards will need one. or a router/hub/switch.
or at least thats how it used to be
